actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act defining the term "navigable waters."

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to redefine the term "navigable waters" to include only those waters capable of transporting interstate or foreign commerce shoreward to the ordinary high water mark.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act defining the term "navigable waters."
